job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen, implementeren, verbeteren en onderhouden van AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (apps, webservices, en evt. andere frontends etc.)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building, implementing, improving, and maintaining AI/ML solutions within existing applications and services.

job_tasks.phrase: Het kunnen toepassen van verschillende vormen van Machine Learning in de contexten van beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie en Recommending Systems alsmede nieuwe en andere vormen van ML en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase details the application of various Machine Learning techniques (image recognition, NLP, speech recognition/generation, recommending systems) which falls under model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen van model training scripts en data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation of scripts for model training and data pipelines, which is a key aspect of data engineering for ML.

job_tasks.phrase: Verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en verbindingen maken met data bronnen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the essential data preparation steps: collection, cleaning, evaluation, and connecting to data sources, which are core data engineering tasks.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional Machine Learning tasks such as image recognition, NLP, speech recognition/generation, and recommending systems. While it mentions building and integrating these solutions into applications (Macro-Category A), the core of the responsibilities lies in the development and application of ML models and the associated data pipelines (Macro-Category B). There is no mention of Generative AI specific tasks like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. Therefore, the profile is 'Core ML Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed in its description of tasks and technologies. The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is evident, and the ad clearly falls into the traditional ML category without any ambiguity. The language used directly maps to the definitions in the coding book.
